articles.content:
Libyan embassy officials help Korean farmers 
    Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Secretary Ahmed Amer al Muakkaf and staff members of the People's Bureau of Libya here visited the Korea-Libya Friendship Jangchon Cooperative Farm on Thursday.
 They helped farmers in farming and talked with each other, deepening feelings of friendship.    
 They handed aid materials over to the farm.

Hong Song Nam meets delegation of Swiss ABB ltd. 
    Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, premier of the DPRK cabinet, had a talk with the delegation of the Swiss ABB ltd. headed by its senior group officer Sune Karlsson on a visit to the DPRK at the Mansudae Assembly Hall yesterday.
 Present there were Jon Sung Hun, minister of metal and machine-building industries, and officials concerned, and staff members of the Swiss and Swedish embassies here and the chief of the mission of the Swiss ABB ltd. here.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Democratic Congo
Japanese prefectural governor's anti-DPRK remarks under fire
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Democratic Congo 
    Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on June 26 sent a congratulatory message to Joseph Kabila, President of the Democratic Republic of Congo, on the occasion of its 41st Independence Day.
 The message extended warm felicitations to the president, government and people of the DRC on this occasion.    
 In the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, it sincerely wished the president and people of the DRC great success in the work to achieve peace, sovereignty and territorial integrity of the country.
